snippet: A 34-year-old man was fatally stabbed in the neck and a 22-year-old man was slashed on his head during a dispute at a co-op building in the Allerton neighborhood, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A 34-year-old man was fatally stabbed in the neck and a 22-year-old man was slashed on his head during a dispute at a co-op building in the Allerton neighborhood, the police said.

headline.main: Bronx Stabbing Leaves One Dead and Another Hospitalized
